Betweenness centrality: Indicator of a node's centrality in a network.
Eigen Vectory Centrality: Thi smetric measures the importance of a node in a graphj as a function of teh importance of its neighbours.
Closeness centrality: Away of detecting nodes that are able to spread information very efficiently through a graph.
Eccentricity: measures how far a node id from the node moset distance from it in the network.
